original_text: And all Israel heard it said that Saul had defeated the garrison of the Philistines, and also that Israel had become a stench to the Philistines. And the people were called out to join Saul at Gilgal.
korean_text: 온 이스라엘이 사울이 블레셋 사람들의 수비대를 친 것과 이스라엘이 블레셋 사람들의 미움을 받게 되었다 함을 듣고 그 백성이 길갈로 모여 사울을 따르니라

sentences.original_text: And all Israel heard it said
that Saul had defeated the garrison of the Philistines,
sentences.korean_translation: 사울이 블레셋 사람의 수비대를 쳐부쉈다는 것과

sentences.original_text: and also that Israel had become a stench to the Philistines.
And the people were called out to join Saul at Gilgal.
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들은 사울과 함께 길갈로 모이라고 불렸다
